data.name: Sabretooth
data.description: A savage, regenerating brute that shreds single targets and chains to additional enemies.

starItems.name: Sabretooth
starItems.description: A savage, regenerating brute that shreds single targets and chains to additional enemies.

4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.
 > This attack gains <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> on the primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.
 > This attack gains <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.
 > This attack gains <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

If Omega Red is an ally, this attack does an additional <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to each target.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

If Omega Red is an ally, this attack does an additional <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to each target.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

If Omega Red is an ally, this attack does an additional <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to each target.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary target
<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to all targets if Omega Red is an ally

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

If Omega Red is an ally, this attack does an additional <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to each target.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, this attack does an additional <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to each target.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to all targets if Omega Red is an ally

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>390%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, this attack does an additional <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to each target.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to secondary targets
<color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing to all targets if Omega Red is an ally

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>460%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, this attack does an additional <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing to each target.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> target. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> target. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> target. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> target. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>5</color> targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>5</color> targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> target. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>5</color> targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If Omega Red is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> target. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> targets for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff586>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If Omega Red is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> target. Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this action.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color>, <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color>, or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally.
If Mister Sinister or Omega Red is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit chance.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>MARAUDERS</color> ally

2.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color>, <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color>, or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally.
If Mister Sinister or Omega Red is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit chance.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>MARAUDERS</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>MARAUDERS</color> ally

3.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color>, <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color>, or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally.
If Mister Sinister or Omega Red is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit chance.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>MARAUDERS</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>60%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, If Wolverine is present, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>

4.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>60%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color>, <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color>, or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally.
If Mister Sinister or Omega Red is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit chance.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, If Wolverine is present, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>MARAUDERS</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>MARAUDERS</color> ally

5.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>60%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>BROTHERHOOD</color>, <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color>, or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally.
If Mister Sinister or Omega Red is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit chance.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, If Wolverine is present, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities per <color=#fff568>MARAUDERS</color> ally.
